column1: prompt
Find examples of the word “enigma” used correctly in two sentences.
Explain why self-directed learning is important.
Identify three characters in the following story. John, a young adventurer, and his friend Amy embark on a quest to recover a magical item hidden in a dark and dangerous dungeon.
Name some problems that are solved by artificial intelligence algorithms.
Evaluate the following algebraic equation. 2 (3 + 5)
Name the four musketeers.
How old is the oldest living person in the world?
Find and list 7 elements of the periodic table.
Write a 500-character speech summarizing the main points of the article. The article discusses the impact of deforestation on global wildlife populations.
Come up with two conversation topics that might be discussed between two people.

Find and list three quotes about courage.
Summarize the content of the passage in 15 words. The article is about the current pandemic situation in the United States.
Generate a marketing slogan for a newly launched vitamin supplement.
Describe the behavior of a monkey for the following situation. It is lunchtime, and the monkey is hungry.
Extract information - what is the price of a one-way ticket to London from New York?

Generate a steganography algorithm

Make an accurate analogy for the term "financial risk".
Choose a title for a humorous essay.
Translate this sentence into a more casual tone. I was unable to make it to the meeting.
Suggest two possible alternatives for this item. Advil
Generate a one line story that expresses a moral.

Given a list of elements, find the two elements which sum up to the given number Given a list [2, 3, 4, 8] and a sum of 6,

Write two sentences showing how to use a thesaurus.

How would you identify and resolve a DNS issue on a host computer?

Generate a list of questions that can be used to evaluate a machine learning model.
Create a flow chart to explain the working of a web browser.
What is the significance of the given incident in the passage? John was walking down the street when he suddenly saw a car crash into a post.
Name five feelings or emotions you think the passage elicits. John was walking down the street when he suddenly saw a car crash into a post.

Provide two other alternative names for the following movie title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

FACT 1: Elephants are bigger than cats
FACT 2: Dogs bark
FACT 3: Ducks can swim

Invent a new word to denote the given concept. Happiness

State one of the qualifications for being president of the United States.
Explain why a book has been given a certain rating. The book was given a rating of 4.5/5.
Propose a solution to end world hunger
Compose a metaphor to describe a blooming flower

And tears that ____ the ground

Create a headline for a new article about the next generation of Artificial Intelligence.
Create a five-sentence story about a woman who conquers her fear of heights.

Provide two reasons why using artificial intelligence can improve customer service.
Following the input, provide a core definition for the term “Spotify”. Spotify

Following the input, provide a practical example of Natural Language Processing (NLP). Natural Language Processing

Describe how cryptocurrencies work in a few sentences.
Describe the conventions used in MLA style for in-text citations.

Mars mass: 6.39 × 1023 kg

Watching it slowly fading away
In sorrowful goodbye."
